sentences.sContent: Gina’s grades have improved marginally since last term.
sentences.sCn: 从上学期开始吉娜的成绩略有提高。

sentences.sContent: The new system is only marginally more efficient than the old one.
sentences.sCn: 新系统的效率比旧系统只有略微提高。

synos.tran: 少量地；最低限度地；在栏外；在页边

words.tran: 边缘；利润，余裕；页边的空白
排斥；忽视；使处于社会边缘；使脱离社会发展进程

trans.tranOther: not enough to make an important difference
